segments.text: Hello , I need to register for a class .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What class are you trying to take ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to take a Psychology class .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , there are only two classes open .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you tell me what days the classes are on ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: One class is on Tuesday and Thursday from 2 p . m . to 4 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That class is from ten to twelve on Monday and Wednesday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you sure these are the only open classes ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , sign me up for the class on Monday and Wednesday .
segments.speaker: S1
